sentences: Võta pluus ära, ja särk samuti!
Ma arvan täpselt samuti kui sina.
Kui teised lähevad, siis mina samuti.
context: The Estonian adverb 'samuti' has three main meanings: 1) in the same way or similarly (e.g., acting just the same), 2) additionally/as well/too when adding something to what was mentioned before, and 3) casually/without particular purpose. It's often used at the end of sentences to mean 'as well' or 'too', and can also indicate similarity in manner.
